resources.string: Why are you unlocking your phone?

string-array.name: unlock_prompts
string-array.item: Why are you unlocking your phone?
What brings you here today?
What is the mission this time?
What are we looking for?
What is calling your attention?
Back again I see... no judgment
Hey there! What is on your mind?
Welcome back, friend. What is up?
Good to see you! What do you need?
Hi! What can your phone help with today?
What adventure are we going on?
What is it this time?
Whatcha looking for, buddy?
Another unlock, another story!
Peek-a-boo! What is the plan?
Oh, hello there! What is happening?
Ready for action? What is the goal?
Time for some phone magic? What kind?
Let me guess... just checking something quick?
Ah yes, the classic phone unlock. Purpose?
Another 5-second check that becomes 30 minutes?
Totally was not going to scroll, right?
This time it is definitely important, right?
Sure you are not just bored?
Make this unlock count! What is the goal?
Time to be intentional. What is the purpose?
Stay focused! What do you actually need?
Be mindful. What is truly important right now?
Make this meaningful. Why are you here?
Purposeful phone use starts now. What is needed?
Take a breath. What do you really need?
Pause and reflect. What is the intention?
Before we dive in, what is the purpose?
A moment of mindfulness: why unlock?
Gently asking: what is drawing you here?
With awareness, what is your true need?
Phone unlocked! Now what, genius?
Congratulations on unlocking! Purpose?
The phone is free! But why?
Unlock sound! Okay, spill it. What for?
Phone: unlocked. Brain: hopefully engaged. Why?
Achievement unlocked: Phone Access. Reason?
Hope you are doing well. What do you need?
Checking in on you. What is important right now?
Taking care of yourself today? What is needed?
Your wellbeing matters. What is the intention?
Being kind to yourself? What is the purpose?
Phone unlocked. State your business.
Unlock detected. Reason required.
What is the plan?
Purpose?
Intent?
What is needed?
Task at hand?
In this moment of connection, what is your why?
What story will this unlock tell?
Every unlock is a choice. What is yours?
What meaning will you create with this access?
Your attention is precious. Where will you direct it?
This moment will not come again. What is important?
Time is ticking. What is worth your attention?
How will you spend these next few minutes?
Another moment, another choice. What is yours?
What deserves your time right now?
What does your future self want you to do?
Are you being the person you want to be?
What would make you proud of this unlock?
How does this serve your bigger goals?
What is your highest priority right now?
You have got this! What is the focus?
Ready to be awesome? What is the mission?
You are in control. What is the conscious choice?
Believe in your intentions. What are they?
You are capable of mindful choices. What is this one?

resources.string: Ongoing tasks from phone unlock reasons
